group_1.textLeft: Careful, don't walk over there!
I'm securing the area!

group_1.textRight: Securing? Oh, to preserve the evidence?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! You can't study the forensics of the@crime scene if you don't keep it clean!
For instance, if we use this blacklight...@
We can see footprints that were left behind!

group_1.textRight: [chara:200401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! That's amazing! I didn't know you@could do that!

group_1.textLeft: Just apply a little scientific knowledge and@it's no problem!
Okay, I'm turning the lights off.
Now I'll light up the floor with the blacklight.
Look!
Give it a minute!
Heh, that's science for ya! The fruit of@mankind's wisdom!

group_1.textRight: There's so many footprints, though... How do@we tell which one's the culprit's?

group_1.textLeft: This school has everyone wear the same kinda@slippers. I can tell which ones are which!
See? These are this school's slipper marks.

group_1.textRight: I see! So if we find prints that don't match@those, they must be from an outsider.
How about these? Wait, no, maybe these@belong to a teacher...

group_1.textLeft: That's possible, but since there aren't any @other suspicious ones...
These have to be the culprit's footprints!
Yeah, still not enough evidence...
Hmm? What's up?

group_1.textRight: Look at these prints... They stretch to way @over there.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm? What is it?
Heh?
Have you snapped or something, Sayaka?

group_1.textRight: Nope! I just figured it out!
I know who hit you, Hinano!
